Detailed Description

This module provides a simple logger.

The logger is policy-based.

See also
Log_policy_interface How to define and use your own logging policy.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum bolder::Log_level
strong

The Log_level enum.

Enumerator
info 

Verbose information mainly useful to represent current progress of application.

debug 

Informational events most useful for developers to debug application, should output nothing in Release mode.

warning 

Information representing potential errors in the use of engine.

error 

Error event that are not likely severely influence the engine.

fatal 

Very severe error event that will presumably lead the engine to crash.

Variable Documentation

Logger< Log_debug_policy > bolder::g_logger {}

Globle logger.

Sample usage:

g_logger(Log_level::info) << "Hello world\n";
